content: PM-KISAN scheme provides income support of Rs. 6000 per year to small and marginal farmers. Eligible farmers with landholding up to 2 hectares can apply online through the official portal.
Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) provides comprehensive crop insurance coverage. Premium rates are 2% for Kharif crops and 1.5% for Rabi crops. Covers yield losses due to natural calamities.
Kisan Credit Card (KCC) provides short-term credit to farmers for crop production. Interest rate is 7% per annum with 3% interest subvention. Loan limit based on land holding and cropping pattern.
